<div class="gmr-blockpost-title" style="background-color: white; border-color: rgb(51, 51, 51) rgb(51, 51, 51) rgb(236, 240, 241); border-style: none none double; border-width: 0px 0px 3px; color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif, sans-serif-light, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px 0px 10px; text-align: center;"><h1 class="post-title entry-title" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 'Open Sans', Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif, sans-serif-light, sans-serif; font-size: 30px; font-weight: 300; line-height: 42px; margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding-left: 0px; padding-right: 0px; word-wrap: break-word;"><span class="notranslate" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">How to easily backup template blogger or blogspot</span></h1><div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;"><a href="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ckNqKjK4iac/WRb5CltPGFI/AAAAAAAAACE/KXjMhakpN2MA2CWE3T3_L_JD56H0MffQwCLcB/s1600/download.png" imageanchor="1" style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;" rel="noopener noreferer nofollow"><img border="0" src="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ckNqKjK4iac/WRb5CltPGFI/AAAAAAAAACE/KXjMhakpN2MA2CWE3T3_L_JD56H0MffQwCLcB/s1600/download.png"></a></div><div><span class="notranslate" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);"><br></span></div></div><div class="post-body entry-content gmr-item-post" style="background-color: white; border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51); color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif, sans-serif-light, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 24px; margin: 10px 0px;"><span class="notranslate" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">Backup blogger or blogspot template&nbsp;is very important to know by the bloggers beginners before editing.</span>&nbsp;<span class="notranslate" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">Due to avoid an error in editing templates blogspot blogger or you, if there was an error in the code so you can edit the template to restore back.</span><br><br style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);"><span class="notranslate" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">Ok buddy&nbsp;, although this knowledge is a simple but very important .... Here's how to easily backup template blogger or blogspot:</span><br><br style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);"><span class="notranslate" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">1. Please go to the&nbsp;<b style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">TEMPLATE</b></span><br><div class="separator" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51); text-align: center;"><img alt="How to easily backup blogger or blogspot templates 1" id="-wl-ii0" src="data:image/webp;base64," style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51); display: block; max-width: 100%; vertical-align: middle; width: 244px;"></div><br style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);"><span class="notranslate" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">2. Click the button&nbsp;<b style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">BACK UP / RESTORE</b>&nbsp;on the right of your screen:</span><br><div class="separator" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51); text-align: center;"><img alt="How to easily backup template blogger or blogspot 2" id="-wl-ii1" src="data:image/webp;base64," style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51); display: block; margin: 0px 1.5px; max-width: 100%; vertical-align: middle; width: 244px;"></div><br style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);"><span class="notranslate" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">3. Then will appear a popup.</span>&nbsp;<span class="notranslate" data-xp="1" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">Then click&nbsp;<b style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">DOWNLOAD FULL TEMPLATE</b></span><br><div class="separator" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51); text-align: center;"><img alt="How to easily backup blogger or blogspot template 3" id="-wl-ii2" src="data:image/webp;base64," style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51); display: block; max-width: 100%; vertical-align: middle; width: 244px;"></div><br style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);"><span class="notranslate" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">4. Then download and save your template xml file in the computer.</span><br><span class="notranslate" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">5. Remember the folder where your templates or copy this file to the flash disk or folder on your computer safe.</span><br><br style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);"><span class="notranslate" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">Then how to restore the templates that have previously been backed up is easy:</span><br><span class="notranslate" data-xp="2" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">1. Click the button&nbsp;<b style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">BACK UP / RESTORE</b>&nbsp;as in the above tutorial.</span><br><span class="notranslate" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">2. This will bring up a popup like the picture above, just click&nbsp;<b style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">the Browse&nbsp;</b>on the popup and click upload.</span><br><span class="notranslate" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">3. After you click upload just wait until the uploading process successfully.</span><br><span class="notranslate" style="border: 0px none rgb(51, 51, 51);">If you already know how to back up and restore templates means that we are able to edit the template as we want, either change the structure of seo template, add widgets, change css or javascript, and others.</span></div><style amp-custom="">.thumb-post{text-align:center;margin:0;padding:0;width:100%} .thumb-post amp-img{width:100%;max-width:100%;height:auto;min-height:450px;max-height:600px;margin:0} </style> <br><div class="thumb-post"><noscript><img src="https://scontent.fsub2-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/fr/cp0/e15/q65/17796846_1773189839677671_6977008867135609966_n.png.jpg?efg=eyJpIjoidCJ9&amp;oh=292c21d1c58e8e185a8d6c63dec60c5a&amp;oe=5957C4B8" width="650" height="350" alt="NoScript Default Fallback" title="default fallback"></noscript></div>
